divs: sighting detailsat first i was not going to file a report because i have no idea what it was i saw, then i recognized the irony of that, so here goes. i was dropping my dog off at the kennel a little after 3:00 pm. i had gotten out of my car and just happened to look up. the sky was mostly clear with a few patches of cirrus type clouds. the object was in a clear area of the sky but close enough to a bank of clouds to tell that it was at a lower altitude. the object looked like a bright white dash (just like this: - ) with slightly rounded ends. it was so bright it almost appeared to be glowing. from my perspective, it would have been a little less than 1\2 an inch long. there was no contrail, no sound, no wings, tail or markings. it was not moving quickly, so i watched, trying to figure out what it might be. after a minute or two, it simply faded out of sight. it did not move behind clouds, or leave my field of vision, it faded out. i instantly recalled an incident from the summer of 1978 when i saw exactly the same thing. i was laying in the grass staring up at the sky. oddly enough it would have been around 3:00 pm then as well. i saw a bright white cigar shaped object moving through a perfectly blue, cloudless sky. it would have been very close to the same size and shape and moving at roughly the same rate of speed. i watched it cross the sky until it went behind some hills and out of my field of vision. i had the same thoughts as a girl that i had this time, just trying to figure out what i was looking at, curious and a little bewildered. i assumed it was probably a plane. i am assuming there is a man-made answer this time as well. i have seen some pictures on this site that resemble what i saw. (sorry, no pics--i didn't have a camera at hand.) you guys are the experts, and i am sure that if it is something normal you have already seen it enough times to have figured that out. i would appreciate you letting me know. feel free to contact me via e-mail as i am harder to catch by phone. and my heartfelt thanks for the work you do!
Summary: Bright white cigar shaped object moving steadily across the sky
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Morehead
There were no other sightings in Morehead on or around February 11th 2011
